column2: "Iyi nye EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔbaa Beeri ba Hosea hɔ
column7: na Israelhen Jeroboam a ɔyɛ Joas ne ba no ne nda mu no."

column2: "Ber a EWURADZE nam Hosea do kasaa asɔpɔn no
column5: kɛfa ɔbaa edwaman na ndwaman mba war: na asaase no efi EWURADZE nkyɛn rogor ndwamangor kɛse."

column2: "Nna ɔkɔree kɛfaa Diblaim ne babaa Gomer; na onyinsenii woo babanyin maa no."

column3: To no dzin Jezreel; osiandɛ aka kakra ma meebedzi Jezreel no bɔgyaa ho wer wɔ Jehu fi do
column4: na maama Israel fi ahendzi no abɔ adze."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ da no mubobubu Israel egyen mu wɔ Jezreel bɔnsa mu."
"Na onyinseen bio na ɔwoo babaa. Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: To no dzin Lo-ruhama a ne nkyerɛase nye nyia oennhu no mbɔbɔr: osiandɛ merennda ho nnhu Israel fi mbɔbɔr

column2: "Na mubohu Juda fi mbɔbɔr na magye hɔn nkwa
column3: wɔ EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn no mu
To no dzin Lo-ammi ase nye dɛ ɔnnyɛ me man: osiandɛ hom nnyɛ me man
column4: na mo so mennyɛ hom Nyankopɔn."
column5: "#1.9 MENNYƐ HOM NYANKOPƆN: Hebriw no kyerɛ mennyɛ homdze."

column2: "Naaso Israelmba hɔn dodow bɛyɛ dɛ mpoano anhwea a wonnsusu eso wɔnnkan; na ɔbɛba dɛ fakor a wɔsee hɔn dɛ
"Na Judamba na Israelmba bɔbɔ mu ehyia na wɔahyɛ otsitsir kor ama hɔnho
column3: na wɔafow efi asaase no do akɔ: na Jezreel da no bɛyɛ da kɛse."
